title: Marvelman
author: Marvelman
content: I recently came across this free 1TB cloud. You can get another 50GB of space on the cloud every day. To get space on a daily basis, you need to watch a 30-second video. Videos are most often advertisements for games.Does anyone have experience with this service? Is it ok or is it a spam apk? Is there any similar free service that checked OK?
